traffic.name: Traffic Sim
traffic.tagLine: This was the fourth semester project at the Maastricht University. It was built in a team with two other programmers.

caption.heading: Road Details
caption.content: Selecting a road segment shows extra information about the segment.

caption.heading: Statistics
caption.content: Live graphs showing the behavior of the system.

caption.heading: Minimap
caption.content: Minimap also shows road network usage.

traffic.description:
Microscopic Traffic Simulation using the Intelligent Driver Model
Has 4 different traffic light control strategies that try to optimize throughput.
The application is entirely written in python using PyGame for the drawing and numpy for several calculations.

I contributed simulation code and worked on data visualization together with writing the UI toolkit.
Additionally I wrote a map editor running in the browser which exports maps in a JSON format to be imported into the simulation.

snooker.name: UM Snooker
snooker.tagLine: A snooker simulation with AI developed in a team of three for the second semester project at the Maastricht University

caption.heading: Full control
caption.content: Change force, cue angle and point of impact.

caption.heading: Shot previews
caption.content: Watch live how your shot will influence the game.

caption.heading: Advanced physics
caption.content: Sliding, spinning, deflection, friction - everything is implemented.

caption.heading: Watch the AI
caption.content: See what the AI is thinking. All planning is shown live.

caption.heading: Visual assistance
caption.content: With indicators for the currently active balls

booking.name: Booking App
booking.tagLine: A dynamic, api-driven booking interface with dependency tracking and automatic surcharge handling.

caption.heading: Fully dynamic shopping cart
caption.content: Your shopping cart is always up to date without any delays or page refreshes.

caption.heading: Dependency Tracking
caption.content: Product dependencies and special offers are always tracked and applied automatically.

caption.heading: Simplicity is key
caption.content: Show exactly what the user wants and needs to know.

caption.heading: Dynamic surcharge and rebate handling
caption.content: Add surcharges and rebates that depend on several booking factors without touching the code. Everything is dynamic and api-driven.

cavenav.name: Cavenav
cavenav.tagLine: A virtual map created together with Thomas Misera to facilitate exploring the cave systems around Maastricht

caption.heading: Compass supported map
caption.content: Always stays at the correct rotation. A separate compass is no longer required.

caption.heading: Raycaster
caption.content: Gives you an impression what your surroundings should look like.

caption.heading: Routing
caption.content: Let your tablet plan your way. It's optimal.

caption.heading: 4 Modes
caption.content: Look around, find the shortest path to your destionation, edit the graph and add points of interest.

caption.heading: Flashlight included
caption.content: Helps walking safely in complete darkness

spiro.name: Spirograph
spiro.tagLine: This is my submission for 2010 JS1K competition, which is about writing Javascript programs that fit in under 1k.
spiro.description:
Creates random animated Spirograph patterns
Left click to add another random pattern on top
Press "C" to toggle colors
Press "F" to toggle fade effect
Press "P" to pause
Press "Space" to reset
Press "S" to save the picture
